籤詩版本二:
Monga momwe crane ikutuluka mu khola lake lakufa, ndizotheka kuthawa mu khola lachivundi.
Palibe zotchinga pakati pa kumpoto, kumwera ndi kum'mawa. Mutha kupita molunjika ku Jiuxiao Palace.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira chithunzi cha crane yomwe ikuchoka mu khola lake.
Chilichonse chimakhala choipa pasadakhale komanso chabwino pamapeto pake.
解曰: Osadandaula. Msewuwu ndi wotukuka. Khalani omasuka. Osasamala ngati munthu (mulungu).
籤詩故事一:
◇Ziya anasiya udindo wake
Pamene Jiang Ziya ankagwira ntchito yolosera zam’tsogolo, anaona kuti mkazi wina wasandulika ndi mzimu wa jade pipa, choncho anamugwira n’kumumenya ngakhale ndi mwala wa inki. Prime Minister wa Mfumu Zhou adalongosola zomwe zidachitika, adafunsa zomwe zidachitika, kenako adatenga Jiang Ziya kuti akawone Mfumu Zhou. Jiang Ziya anagwiritsa ntchito Samadhi Woona Moto kuti awotche mzimu wa pipa kuchokera mu mawonekedwe ake oyambirira pamaso pa Mfumu Zhou, ndipo Mfumu Zhou inamupanga kukhala wamkulu.
Pofuna kubwezera mzimu wa jade pipa, Daji adapempha Mfumu Zhou kuti alamula Jiang Ziya kuti amange nsanja ya nswala, Jiang Ziya adadzudzula Mfumu Zhou, ndipo Mfumu Zhou inalamula kuti aphedwe. Atabwerera kunyumba, Jiang Ziya adafunsa Ma za kupita ku Xiqi, ndipo Ma adafuna kumusudzula. Choncho Jiang Ziya anapita ku Xiqi (likulu la Mfumu Wen ya Zhou Dynasty) yekha.
Jiang Ziya anafika ku Xiqi n’kumakhala m’malo opha nsomba ku Panxi Gorge, anakumana ndi Mfumu Wen ya ku Zhou yomwe inali yofunitsitsa kufunafuna luso.
聖意: Ndilibe mtendere kunyumba ndipo ndikufunanso kufunafuna mgwirizano pazachuma, kuchitapo kanthu, ukwati, Liujia, oyenda pansi amuna, kuwona minda, mphutsi za silika, phindu la m'dzinja, kutayika kwa ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi, kufunafuna anthu, kulepheretsa milandu ya anthu, kusamuka, katundu wotayika, kum'mwera chakum'mawa. matenda, malo, kutumiza mapiri ndi manda, zabwino
第X籤: Wopambana wa lotale wa khumi ndi zinayi
